name: Idle Sweeper
description:
Control your creature, build an army of mates and sweep blocks.

In Idle Sweeper you can choose any of 20 heroes: Greenchy, Pinky, Flinky, Snowy, Nibbler, Spiky, Funky, Picaso, Choco, Croco, Wingy, Billy, Fluffy, Mazy, Drago, Mr Smart, Ms Violet, Red Dragon, Mr Robo, Mr Pixel

3 new special characters added.

Keep Calm and Sweep Dots ;)
